name: Super Pinball II: The Amazing Odyssey
overview: The sequel to the 1994 SNES game Super Pinball: Behind the Mask, though did not join it with a release in North America. The game is, however, entirely in English. The game features three tables: The sci-fi "Space Sister", the James Bond-inspired "The Spy Eyes", and the circus-themed "Showtime". Each table has its own quirks and high scoring zones to discover, such as Space Sister having a second set of paddles higher up the table or Showtime with its own mini-game. The game can be played in Contest mode, which has one or two players (down from the original game's four) compete to earn the highest score possible on a single table, or the Conquest mode in which a single player attempts to beat all three tables - they need to score 100 million points on a table in order to progress to the next.
